trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event to provide custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>eventos para fornecer a ordenação personalizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade não está definida e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs once for each pair of cells in the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre uma vez para cada par de células na coluna a ser ordenados.

trans-unit.source: It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload.
trans-unit.target: -Ocorre apenas quando o utilizador clica no cabeçalho da coluna com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, ou quando chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName>de sobrecarga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs for a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando este evento ocorre para uma coluna com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, deve apresentar o ordenação glifo através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para ordenar linhas utilizando os valores das células na coluna de um ou em várias colunas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>Propriedades para comparar os valores na coluna especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> properties to access values in other columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A>Propriedades para aceder aos valores existentes nas outras colunas através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The column to sort.
trans-unit.target: A coluna para ordenar.

trans-unit.source: The value of the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: O valor da célula primeiro a comparar.

trans-unit.source: The value of the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: O valor da célula segundo a comparar.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the first cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a primeira célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a segundo célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da célula primeiro a comparar.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é normalmente utilizada em conjunto com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the first cell.
trans-unit.target: O valor da célula primeiro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da célula segundo a comparar.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é normalmente utilizada em conjunto com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the second cell.
trans-unit.target: O valor da célula segundo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coluna a ser ordenada.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful in determining and controlling sort behavior in programmatic sorts.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é útil para determinar e controlar o comportamento de ordenação no ordena programática.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> to sort.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> para ordenar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row containing the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da linha que contém a primeira célula para comparar.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é útil quando a ordenação de linhas com base nos valores de célula de várias colunas.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a segundo célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row containing the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da linha que contém a célula de segunda a comparar.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é útil quando a ordenação de linhas com base nos valores de célula de várias colunas.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a segundo célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the order in which the compared cells will be sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a ordem na qual as células compared irão ser ordenadas.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value is typically the last operation you will perform in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Definir este valor é, geralmente, a última operação que irá realizar um processador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You will typically set this value to the return value of a comparison method such as <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, irá definir este valor para o valor de retorno de um método de comparação, tais como <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Less than zero if the first cell will be sorted before the second cell; zero if the first cell and second cell have equivalent values; greater than zero if the second cell will be sorted before the first cell.
trans-unit.target: Menor que zero se a primeira célula irá ser ordenada antes da célula segundo; zero se a primeira célula e a segunda célula têm valores equivalentes; maior que zero se o segundo célula irá ser ordenada antes da primeira célula.
